title: Resize global background asset, adjust Home tab label styling, and increase Home Play button prominence

requirements.summary: Create a 5x smaller global background image and update all references (App background, Settings cache clear, and service worker special handling) to use the new filename.
acceptanceCriteria: A new background image asset exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with dimensions equal to the previous background dimensions divided by 5 (rounded to integers).
`frontend/src/App.tsx` uses the new background filename in the `backgroundImage: url(...)` style.
`frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen.tsx` clears the new background filename from caches (and no longer references the old filename).
`frontend/public/service-worker.js` applies its network-first special handling to the new background filename (and no longer references the old filename).
Reloading the app shows the same background image visually, but served from the new smaller-dimension asset.

file_operations.description: Add a new resized background image derived from the current background by dividing width and height by 5 (1024x576 -> 205x115), keeping the same visual content.
Update the fixed global background `backgroundImage` reference to use `frontend/public/assets/generated/user-background.dim_205x115.png` instead of `user-background.dim_1024x576.png`.
Update the background cache clear logic to delete `frontend/public/assets/generated/user-background.dim_205x115.png` (and remove references to `user-background.dim_1024x576.png`).

Update the service worker's special-case network-first handling and CLEAR_BACKGROUND_CACHE deletion to target `frontend/public/assets/generated/user-background.dim_205x115.png` (and remove references to `user-background.dim_1024x576.png`).

requirements.summary: Adjust bottom navigation styling so the 'Home' label renders in white with a bolder font weight, without unintentionally changing other tabs.
acceptanceCriteria: In the bottom tab navigation, the 'Home' label text is white.
The 'Home' label text uses a bold font weight (e.g., `font-bold` or stronger than the current weight).
Other tabs (Shows, Settings) are not unintentionally changed unless required to preserve layout consistency.

file_operations.description: Update the 'Home' tab label styling so the label text is white and uses a bolder font weight than the current `font-medium`, while keeping Shows/Settings label styling unchanged.

requirements.summary: Increase the visual prominence of the Home screen Play/Pause button (contrast/outline/icon size) while preserving behavior, spinner, and disabled/loading states.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home screen Play/Pause button is noticeably more prominent than before (increased visual weight/contrast).
The button still shows the spinner when connecting/loading and still toggles Play/Pause correctly.
Disabled states still look disabled and prevent interaction.

file_operations.description: Enhance the main Play/Pause button styling (e.g., stronger ring/outline, higher-contrast shadow, and/or slightly larger button/icon sizes) while preserving existing click behavior and ensuring connecting/loading (spinner) and disabled states remain intact.
